SVpiVecVal
ctypes.​Structure
SVpiVecVal

A ctypes Structure representing a verilog vector  aval/bval of 4-state data type,32-bit signed integer LRM 6.11 Integer data types Contains two 32-bit unsigned integers.

bval aval | 4-state verilog value
----------|----------------------
  0    0  |   0
  0    1  |   1
  1    0  |   X
  1    1  |   Z
